    • Constructor Detail

      • ModeOfOperation

        public ModeOfOperation(BlockCipher cipher,
                       int blockSize)
        Mode of operation for block ciphers.
        Parameters:
        cipher - Block cipher to be used in this mode of operation.
        blockSize - Block size in bytes for the block cipher.

    • Method Detail

      • padBytes

        public byte[] padBytes(byte[] bytes)
        Pads a byte array to the closest integer multiple of the block size used. PKCS#7 padding.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Byte array to be padded.
        Returns:
        PKCS#7 padded byte array.

      • unpadBytes

        public byte[] unpadBytes(byte[] bytes)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Remove PKCS#7 padding from a byte array. Inverse to padBytes.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Byte array to be processed.
        Returns:
        Byte array with PKCS#7 padding removed.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • makeBlocks

        public byte[][] makeBlocks(byte[] bytes)
        Splits an array of bytes into blocks.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Byte array to split into blocks.
        Returns:
        2-dimensional array of bytes with each row representing a block.

      • unmakeBlocks

        public byte[] unmakeBlocks(byte[][] blocks)
        Reverse the things done in makeBlocks.
        Parameters:
        blocks - Array to process.
        Returns:
        1-dimensional array containing all the bytes that were in the blocks-array.

      • encrypt

        public abstract byte[] encrypt(byte[] data)
        Encrypts an array of bytes. Block cipher used is determined on class instantiation.
        Parameters:
        data - Array of bytes to be encrypted.
        Returns:
        Encrypted byte array.

      • decrypt

        public abstract byte[] decrypt(byte[] data)
        Decrypts an array of bytes. Block cipher used is determined on class instantiation.
        Parameters:
        data - Array of bytes to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        Decrypted byte array.
